text: Paweł Halaba (born 14 December 1995) is a Polish volleyball player, a member of the Polish club Warta Zawiercie, PlusLiga. ==Personal life== In 2012 he graduated from the Marshal Stanisław Małachowski High School in Płock. He began studying at AGH University of Science and Technology in Kraków but suspended the studies after one year to continue his volleyball career. ==Career== ===Clubs=== He debuted in first league in 2014 as a player of AZS AGH Kraków. Then he moved to AZS Politechnika Warszawska on loan from Asseco Resovia Rzeszów and debuted in PlusLiga.Michał Filip, Bartłomiej Lemański i Paweł Halaba w AZS Politechnice Warszawskiej! – wp.pl – 12-06-2015 During the first round of season he got an ankle injury, but he came back to volleyball after a short break. Paweł Halaba: Niedoleczona kontuzja może zemścić się w przyszłości – volleycafe.pl – 20-04-2016 In 2017 he moved to Jihostroj České Budějovice. ==Sporting achievements== * National championships ** 2018/2019 16px German Championship, with Hypo Tirol Alpenvolleys Haching * National team ** 2019 16px Summer Universiade ==External links== * Player profile at CEV.eu * Player profile at PlusLiga.pl * Player profile at Volleybox.net ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Płock Category:Sportspeople from Masovian Voivodeship Category:Polish men's volleyball players Category:Universiade medalists in volleyball Category:Universiade silver medalists for Poland Category:Medalists at the 2019 Summer Universiade Category:AZS Warszawa players Category:Trefl Gdańsk players Category:Warta Zawiercie players
title: Paweł Halaba
